TitleEnglish: Necromancer Isekai: How I Went from Abandoned Villager to the Emperor's Favorite
SummaryEnglish: The story follows Mateo, who is reincarnated as the grandson of an aristocrat. He learns to use ancient magic and hatch dragon eggs. The emperor hears of his magical power and checks it out, but he has a secret identity...
Aliases: Mukuwa Renakatta Murabito A, Kizoku ni Hirowarete Dekiai Sareru Ue ni, Jitsuwa Motteita Densetsu-kyÅ« no Kami Skill mo Kakusei Shita
Mukuware Nakatta Murabito A, Kizoku ni Hirowarete Dekiai Sareru Ue ni
